title: AWS Lambda remove null attributes from event marshalling
body:
### Describe the bug

For some lambda event types, Jackson will put in a "null" string for attribute values.  Configure Jackson to remove null attribute

See:  https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/discussions/26261

Hopefully the fix is to just add a config to Jackson ObjectMapper to remove null attributes from event marshalling
